pages.title: Winter Sapling
pages.text: The Winter tree will be covered in snow.

pages.title: Fey Wood
pages.text: Feywood can be obtained by cutting down one of the Fey trees. Each season has its own Fey Wood.

pages.title: Stripped Fey Wood
pages.text: You can strip the Fey Wood. The Stripped Fey wood has their own variety of decoration blocks.

pages.title: Fey Planks
pages.text: Fey Wood can be crafted into Fey Planks. Each season has its own colour.
